proposal:
BLUE

Dear Floris,

Thank you for your time to consider my proposal. I understand you are looking for a freelance agent, but I would kindly ask you to consider to acquire the services of our outsourcing customer service agency to support your DropShipping business. We are a Europe based boutique agency, we are not a very large team and our relationship with you will be exactly the one you would have with a freelancer, one-to-one, or as it fits better for you. And we are DropShipping Specialists!

I perfectly understand your requirements for a customer service freelancer who speaks English and has experience in handling dropshipping customer service. Here's how Maxximize can meet those requirements:
• Fluent English Language: Our team members are fluent in English at native level and can provide adequate responses to customer inquiries in a high standard communication. Also kindly note that all our team members speak at least another major language at native level too, on top of the native language.
• Dropshipping Experience: We have vast experience in handling dropshipping customer service inquiries, understanding the unique challenges and requirements of the dropshipping business model.
• Kindness to Customers: Our approach is customer-centric, and we emphasize kindness and professionalism in all interactions with customers, ensuring a positive and empathetic customer experience.
• Business Mindset: We understand the importance of thinking like a business and making decisions that can help save or make you money. Our team is trained to think like a business, making decisions that can help save or make you money while providing exceptional customer service. It is not by chance that our company is named Maxximize, because we manage the customer service as a revenue generator. We partner with our clients on projects to increase the business success.
• Approx. 1 Hour Daily Availability: At Maxximize, we provide flexible options for our clients, and we can allocate approximately 1 hour of work every day, 7 days a week, to cater to the needs of your business. As your business expands, we can adjust our services accordingly to ensure that your customer service needs are met, ready to scale up or down at short notice depending on the requirements.
• Up to Speed within a Week: We are ready to start immediately, ensuring a seamless integration with your existing customer service processes.. The learning time will be approx zero, as we are already well versed in the DropShipping business, in all the tools needed to manage orders, shipments and customer support. We only need to learn the basics of your products.

Maxximize is a leading global customer service outsourcing company that specializes in providing exceptional multilingual customer experience to help businesses succeed and grow. We understand that customer service is a critical component of any e-commerce business, and we are here to provide top-notch support to your customers, ensuring their satisfaction and loyalty.

As a boutique agency, we have a team of skilled customer service professionals who are fluent in English and have the expertise to handle dropshipping customer service inquiries. Our team members are well-versed in using email platforms such as Gmail and are experienced in solving problems that customers may encounter.

In conclusion, Maxximize is the ideal partner for your e-commerce business. We have the experience, expertise, and dedication to provide exceptional customer service, and we understand the unique requirements of a dropshipping business. We are confident in our ability to exceed your expectations and contribute to the success of your business. Let us be your trusted customer service partner, and we will ensure that your customers receive the best possible support, leaving them satisfied and loyal.

Please contact us to discuss your specific needs further.

Iuliana
@MAxximize

Dear DropShipper,
I have extensive experience as Team Lead managing customer support for multiple DropShipping businesses operating across Europe. I know Gorgias very well, I actually recommend it every time I have the opportunity. I also have strong experience in creating and maintaining SOPs, Macros and Templates: I have some knowledge of Gorgias automation, it is more simple than Zendesk's for example which is quite good, although it is my coder colleagues that usually perform automation-related tasks.

I would be very glad to audit your Customer Service Operations and provide you with a detailed analysis and recommendations.

Thank you for considering my application, and I look forward to hearing back from you.

Sincerely,
Iuliana
@Maxximize

'Strawberry''

Dear Silke,

Thank you for your time to consider my proposal. We appreciate your business and would love to work with you to provide exceptional customer support to your eCommerce dropshipping business.

We are a Europe based boutique agency providing Outsourced Customer Support. Maxximize is a global customer service outsourcing company that provides exceptional Multilingual Customer Experience to help organizations succeed and grow. Our team of over 50 field professionals has the skills, experience and theoretical knowledge necessary to deliver high-quality Customer Support. 

Regarding your specific job requirements, we are confident that we can provide you with excellent customer support services that meet your needs:
    • We do have a strong command of the stack Google Mail + Shopify + Zoom + DeepL + WhatsApp, and we have extensive expertise on DropShipping business operated over the European countries.
    • Handling customer complaints: we have extensive experience in handling customer complaints in a polite and professional manner. We always aim to resolve issues as quickly and efficiently as possible to ensure customer satisfaction. All our team members do have experience on all the possible complaints related to dropshipping business.
    • Reporting on refunds/complaints: We understand the primary importance of tracking and reporting on refunds and complaints, we know that basically the existence of the business is based on Shopify, payment gateways and social media account in good health. This is possible only with a low rate of refunds and/or negative feedback. We are experienced in using data to generate reports and tasks to handle refunds/complaints activities. We can escalate them or manage them directly.
    • Responding to customer emails regarding refunds, tracking numbers, FAQs: We are skilled in providing clear and concise responses to customer inquiries regarding refunds, tracking numbers, and other frequently asked questions. I understand the importance of timely and accurate responses to maintain customer satisfaction. Also, this kind of tickets can be greatly automated with good Template messages and Shopify integration – although for this it is necessary some system as Gorgias, Reamaze, Zendesk in the place of Gmail.
    • Contributing to our documentation and improving our support processes: Out Team Leads are specialist in maintaining knowledge base: SOP, Documentation, proactively improve processes to enhance the customer support experience. We are happy to contribute my ideas and expertise to help improve the support team's effectiveness.
    • Respond to all customer inquiries in a timely and accurate manner: We are committed to responding to all customer inquiries within the 24-hour timeframe you have set. I understand the importance of timely and accurate responses to ensure customer satisfaction.
    • Demonstrate a high level of professionalism at all times: We at Maxximize assure a high level of professionalism in all interactions, with the customers and inside the company. 
    • Speak fluent English both written and verbally: All out team member are fluent English speaker with excellent written and verbal communication skills. Plus each of them are fluent in 1 or more European language upon their mother language. I believe this will be very useful for your customers in all the European countries. In our experience this greatly reduces complaints, helps to solve them more amicably.
    • Minimum 2 years of experience in Customer Support: We all have over 3 years of experience in customer support roles, including handling customer inquiries, complaints, and refunds. Most likely the experience exceeds 5 years.
    • Be available for weekly team calls: We are available for weekly team calls. We understand and agree on the importance of collaboration and organized communication especially in a distributed team.
    • Must be organized, motivated, and willing to learn and grow: Highly organized and motivated to provide excellent customer service. Always looking for opportunities to learn and grow.
    • Available to join immediately: We are available to start immediately, at full time, and excited about the opportunity to join your team.

In conclusion, we believe that Maxximize is an excellent choice for your customer support needs. We have the experience, skills, and knowledge to provide high-quality customer support to your eCommerce dropshipping.
I would recommend to have a try, to assess the benefits of partnering with a company that really knows what a DropShipping Customer Care really is, that can bring value and expertise to your business from the first day, with a very short learning process.

Thank you for considering my application, and I look forward to hearing back from you.

Sincerely,

Diana
@Maxximize

Dear Client,

I am very pleased to apply for the position of Customer Support Manager in your dynamic company. I believe I am the perfect fit for this job and I would be really excited to join your team and help you deliver a top notch, outstanding Customer Support.

I have 10+ years of professional experience, leading various multicultural teams - customer support/experience, marketing, sales and business development including cross team management and executing cutting-edge management techniques.

I am result oriented, I enjoy developing strategies, setting KPI's and continuously support people with guidance on excelling the performance, with development of both individuals and teams.

I’ve managed full Multilingual outsourced Customer Services, with team members of customer support agents across Ukraine, Latvia, Romania, UK, Pakistan, South America and Philippines.

I would be really glad to have the opportunity of an interview, in the format and time most suitable for your recruiting process, so that you could evaluate in full how my skills and expertise can serve the success strategies of your company.

I am passionate about the SaaS business model, I fully agree SaaS customer support plays an important part in reputation, brand image, loyalty, and customer satisfaction. It’s more than just understanding the functionality of the product, solving bugs, and handling technical issues. It’s about being alongside customers throughout their journey and ensuring they have a complete positive experience.

I would like to mention that, while I have not a direct experience on payroll service support, I did manage, among others, the customer support department for a UK based B2B/B2C digital financial services (fintech), with all the extra requirements related to regulations. I have a deep knowledge of ERP and CRM apps too, I am pretty confident I will command the payroll industry ins and outs in a short time.

My competencies include:

- Advanced knowledge of Freshdesk
- Extensive experience in creating SOPs, Knowledge Base
- Deploying and monitoring IQC, CSTA
- Payroll functionality familiarity and knowledge of the industry, from my previous business consulting experience
- SaaS business services and customer support expert

As Customer Service Team Leader, I can take care of the whole cycle of the CS department development. This means that among my duties fall:

- Directly supervising and coordinating the activities of customer service employees
- Continuous training staff on customer service operating procedures, for continuous improvement
- Cooperate with other company’s teams, as you rightly say, to ensure that customer feedback is incorporated into product development and marketing strategies
- In accordance with company's management and their expected goals from CS department, establish KPIs, evaluate the work and performances of staff and make sure all metrics are constantly matched
- Distribute tasks, manage procedure to escalate tasks to other departments manager
- Performing any other job duties as assigned by the management, helping to CS department an active contributor to the value chain

I will be happy to speak to you soon to discuss my fit for the current position. Thank you for the opportunity to apply for this very exciting job.

Best Regard
Iuliana

Dear Client,

Thank you for taking into consideration my profile.

My name is Elena and I am natively proficient in English, with excellent writing and communication skills.

I have 5+ of technical and nontechnical Customer Support experience for B2B and SaaS business software, e-commerce companies and Shopify stores selling on major marketplaces (Amazon, eBay), as well as on own websites.

I have provided CS for mobile accessories, tpms systems, computer software, high quality wines and liquors, pet accessories, sport nutrition products, clothes and many others. Thus, I see no difficulty in learning new products, if needed.

Due to my great experience, I can :

- manage customers’ accounts
- handle email or chat communication with customers
- answer to all sorts of customer issues
- control stressful situations and always assist customers with the utmost professionalism, respect and friendliness

My CS experience also includes :

- handling refunds, replacements, advising customers about delayed orders
- processing orders
- customer feedback and product review management services
- direct communication and orders management with carriers
- orders fulfillment on Magento/Shopify and other e-commerce platforms, covering all pre-sales and post-sales activities

You can be assured your customers will receive the highest level of service they expect and deserve.

I can provide you with very flexible support, being available full-time as well as part-time, according to your needs.

Feel free to contact me for any clarification, I'm looking forward to your reply!

Best Regards
Elena

Dear Customer,

I am very glad to submit my proposal for your project.

I carefully analysed your project requirements, for the help needed to restore and then expand your Amazon business. I fully understand your listing problems and therefore I am very confident I can fulfil the work to solve them.

On the other hand, if the bulk SKU deactivation has been done by Amazon, I had to deal with this sort of problems where SKU eligible to be listed in an Amazon marketplace, and are up and running, are blocked on (some or all) the other European Amazon marketplaces, routinely on a few items but it may happen that it is a blanket deactivation. There are not many reasons for that to happen, so even if I could not state now what it is without first analysing the actual data, it would be quite unprofessional frankly, I can assure you that this is sort of an issue which I am experienced solving in the most efficient way.

Generally speaking, if the products are eligible to be listed on Amazon UK, then we will be able to restore them in the other Amazon EU marketplaces.

Let me also mention that I have full stack knowledge of Amazon marketplace business, I can take and own responsibility for a wide range of areas of it.

I would be really glad to have the opportunity of a conversation, in the format and time most suitable for your recruiting process, so that you could evaluate in full how my skills and expertise can serve the success strategies of your company, and become a valuable member of your team.

Kind Regards,
Iuliana

Dear Client,

I’ve just read your request and I’m sure we could efficiently and profitably cooperate.

My name is Iuliana, I have 8+ experience of Customer Support Team Lead/Manager for various e-commerce dropshipping companies, managing CS departments on Amazon, eBay, and other major marketplaces.

I've provided a full Multilingual Customer Service outsourcing, managing a team of customer support agents based in Ukraine, Latvia and Philippines.

As Customer Service Team Leader, I can take care of the whole cycle of CS department development.

This means that among my duties fall:

- CS Agents Recruitment: prepare and post job profile; actively search profiles, shortlist candidates, prepare tests for candidates and review results, select agents best fitting the vacancies
- Onboard selected agents: make sure they get accounts and access to all the tools the need for their duties, transfer the knowledge base, perform necessary training, teach company policy
- Directly supervising and coordinating the activities of customer service employees
- Continuous training staff on customer service operating procedures, for continuous improvement
- Developing and maintaining productive relationships with all company staff
- In accordance with company's management and their expected goals from CS department, establish KPIs, evaluate the work and performances of staff and make sure all metrics are constantly matched
- Distribute tasks, manage procedure to escalate tasks to other departments manager
- Performing any other job duties as assigned by the management, helping to CS department an active contributor to the value chain

I assure you will see sensible improvements in customer service operations and will achieve the goals for quality, performances and business results.

Feel free to contact me for any clarification :)

Best Regards,
Iuliana

Dear Hiring Manager at Hey Dear,

Thank you for your time to consider my application. I see you are looking for a freelance agent, but I would kindly ask you to consider to acquire the services of our outsourcing customer support agency to support your e-commerce start-up's customer service team. We are a Europe based boutique agency, we are not a very large team and our relationship with you will be exactly the one you would have with a freelancer, one to one, or as it fits better for you.

We have carefully reviewed the requirements of the job ad and are confident that we can provide you with a high-quality service that meets your expectations.

To support your team, we propose the following approach:

Staffing:
We will assign a dedicated and experienced customer support representatives who is fluent in German and English and has prior experience working with Shopify and Zendesk. All our team has extensive experience on Shopify and Zendesk, in case needed we will be able to seamlessly scale up or down the resources required. Our team will be available to handle customer inquiries and provide timely solutions to their problems through email and social media channels.

I have seen that your webstore heydear.de has also French and Italian versions. For your convenience I would like to inform you that in our team there are Customer Support Representative fluent in French + English and Italian + English languages. We stand ready to integrate your Customer Service Department for your international operations.

Communication:
Our team will communicate with your customers using Zendesk and respond to comments on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok in a professional and courteous manner. We will monitor the social media channels closely to ensure that all queries and comments are addressed promptly.

Review Management:
Our team will review and respond to customer reviews on your website and portals to ensure that your customers feel heard and valued. We will take the necessary steps to address any concerns raised in the reviews and provide a satisfactory solution to the customer.

Reporting:
We will create reports to track the performance of our team and provide insights into areas that require improvement. We will also work with your team to expand the Customer Service area by identifying areas that require additional support and proposing solutions to improve the overall customer experience.

Quality Assurance:
We will maintain a high level of quality in our service by regularly training our team members and conducting regular audits to ensure that our performance meets your standards.

We believe that our team has the skills and experience required to meet the requirements of the job ad. Our team is made up of A-players with an independent way of working, self-discipline, and a goal-oriented approach. We are confident that our team members will provide a reliable, loyal, and motivated service that will exceed your expectations.

Thank you for considering our proposal. We look forward to the opportunity to work with you and support your e-commerce start-up's customer service team.

Sincerely
Elena @ Maxximize Team
